item.title: Generating Webfonts
item.description: “Not all fonts are created equal” See the following links for some accompanying code: NotoSansJP-Webfonts Github Repo Webfont Generator POM Fix 2023 Github Repo So, as it turns out, fonts don’t work the same way everywhere. They are different sizes and different formats for different platforms. I discovered while created this static site that if I wanted to have a fancy font that supports Japanese characters, like NotoSansJP, I would need to either source the font directly from Google (which would require me to rely on Google’s resource never changing), or convert the OS level font to something that is called a “Webfont”.
